pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.2: At that time a number of nuns bathed naked at a ford in the river Aciravatī together with prostitutes.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.3: And the prostitutes poked fun at the nuns,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.4: “Venerables, why practice the spiritual life when you’re young? Why not enjoy sensual pleasures?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.5: When you’re old, then you can practice the spiritual life.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.6: In this way you will obtain both benefits.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.7: Being poked fun at by the prostitutes, the nuns were humiliated.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.8: They then went to the nuns’ dwelling place and told the nuns what had happened.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.9: The nuns then told the monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.10: who in turn told the Master.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.11: Soon afterwards the Master gave a teaching and addressed the monks,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.12: “Because of this, monks, I will lay down a training rule for the nuns for the following ten reasons:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.13: for the well-being of the Order …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:6.15: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:7.1: ‘If a nun bathes naked, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:8.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:9.2: if she bathes without wearing a sarong or an upper robe, then the effort constitutes wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:9.3: At the end of the bath, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:10.2: if her robes have been stolen or lost;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:10.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc21:11.1: The first training rule is finished.
